text.sentence: In order to account for the same day change at Katy, please schedule the following deals for 7/24/00 only:
At Exxon Katy (Mtr 4132): Allocate -0- to deal 284599 Allocated 4,500 to deal 339604
At Lone Star Katy (Mtr 67): Allocate 5,000 to deal 341801(new deal) Allocate 5,500 to deal 341808 (new deal)
Please remember that EOL deals are firm.
This means that we can't change the location, volume, or price on these deals.
If questions arise around an EOL deal, please make sure that your audience (traders, myself, etc.) knows that your are discussing an EOL trade.
Let me know if you have any questions.
